title: Electric potential -calculate V from point charges

content.question: If <math alttext="R equals 25 centimeters" overflow="scroll"> <mi>R</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>25</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>cm</mtext> </math> and <math alttext="Q equals 30 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>30</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>nC</mtext></math>, what is the approximate electric potential at the origin?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
